This settlement is controlled by another faction.

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

list_box.comment: Fill in the context object and context function in order to populate the available list of options for the dropdown menu

template_race.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

cmp_diff_tx.componentleveltooltip: You can increase or decrease campaign difficulty by using the slider.

component_text.text: This Lord's campaign does not contain any introductory content. We recommend that you choose a Lord with introductory content for your first campaign.

city_management.componentleveltooltip: If this box is checked, taxes and construction will be automatically managed.||This will free you up to concentrate on other areas of the game.

city_management_tx.componentleveltooltip: If this box is checked, taxes and construction will be automatically managed.||This will free you up to concentrate on other areas of the game.

cpu_moves.componentleveltooltip: If this is checked, visible CPU player's moves will be shown during the end turn phase.||This can help to keep a track on some of the CPU's locations and movements, but the end turn phase will also take longer.

cpu_moves_tx.componentleveltooltip: If this is checked, visible AI player's moves will be shown during the end turn phase.||This can help to keep a track on some of the AI's locations and movements, but the end turn phase will also take longer.

label_tx.componentleveltooltip: The advisor will appear in the top left-hand of the screen.||If this is your first time playing the game, it is probably a good idea to have the advisor on.

component_text.text: [PH]Grimgor Ironhide is regarded by many as one of the greatest Orc warriors ever to have lived. From the day he staggered out of the Blasted Wastes with his grizzled Immortulz bodyguard in tow, his lust for battle has proved insatiable. His mission is simple : unite the Greenskin tribes and carve a path of destruction across the Old World.

text_input_autosave_limit.componentleveltooltip: The number of individual save files to keep when using incremental auto-saves.
